item.title: European markets set to open higher after Christmas closure
item.description: European stocks are set to open higher on Friday, as markets in the region reopen following a closure for the Christmas holiday.

item.title: Stock futures inch down, but major averages are on pace for weekly gains: Live updates
item.description: On Thursday, the Dow Jones Industrial Average ticked higher to end its fifth straight winning day.
